title: Portfolio Workshop
description: Learn how to build a professional portfolio that showcases your projects and skills to potential employers.

title: Mock Interview Night
description: Practice technical and behavioral interviews with industry professionals and receive personalized feedback.

title: Resume Review Session
description: Get expert feedback on your resume from career advisors and optimize it for applicant tracking systems.

title: Networking Mixer
description: Connect with alumni, recruiters, and fellow students in a casual networking environment.

title: Tech Talk: AI in Industry
description: Industry leaders discuss practical applications of AI and machine learning in enterprise environments.

title: Startup Founder Panel
description: Hear from successful startup founders about their journey from student to entrepreneur.
